title.fr: Étude des systèmes de refroidissement des glaciers
title.it: Studio sui sistemi di raffreddamento dei ghiacciai

summary.en: Analysis of passive and active glacier cooling measures.
summary.fr: Analyse des mesures de refroidissement passives et actives des glaciers.
summary.it: Analisi delle misure di raffreddamento passive e attive dei ghiacciai.

request_text: Please provide documentation on all glacier cooling research funded in the last 5 years.
response_text: Attached is the funding report and research data.

summary.en: Requesting documents on environmental assessments for alpine solar installations.
summary.de: Anfrage nach Umweltprüfungen für alpine Solaranlagen.
summary.fr: Demande de documents concernant les évaluations environnementales pour les installations solaires alpines.
summary.it: Richiesta di documenti sulle valutazioni ambientali per gli impianti solari alpini.

request_text: Please provide all environmental impact assessments, planning documents and public consultations related to high-altitude photovoltaic projects since 2023.
response_text: Enclosed you will find the impact assessment summary and public comments (data anonymised).
